title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7677.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7677.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

The requirements of this Part shall apply to all maximum
and medium security facilities except facilities or portions of facilities used
as reception centers, residential treatment facilities, work release or
temporary release facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7677.2

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter V
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
